text: Kodi nthawi siinakwane yoti okhulupirira enieni apereke mitima yawo modzichepetsa ndipo kuti azikumbukira Mulungu ndi choonadi chimene chavumbulutsidwa kwa iwo ndipo kuti asakhale ngati iwo amene adapatsidwa Buku nthawi ya kale? Koma patapita nthawi, mitima yawo idalimba. Ndipo ambiri a iwo ndi ophwanya malamulo
